sessions.prompt: User requested to remove all shader-related code from both bicitaxi and bicitaxi_conductor apps since the barrel distortion shader implementation didn't work.
sessions.summary: Removed all shader code from both Flutter apps: deleted shaders/ folders containing barrel_distortion.frag, deleted barrel_distortion_filter.dart widget files from lib/core/widgets/, and removed shader references from pubspec.yaml files. Both apps passed flutter analyze with no issues.
